basics.name: Sydoruk Serhii
basics.label: Frontend Software Engineer
basics.summary: After working more than 8 years in client side programming, I have successfully delivered many different projects: rich, big and small, complex, interesting and awesome web projects for healthcare system, political campaign analytic system, homeownerâ€™s maintenance management system and many others. I was a team player both in big and small agile teams. I also have experience working closely with design teams to translate their work into a pixel-perfect web format, while maintaining responsive web design conventions. I actively seek out new technologies and stay up-to-date on industry trends and advancements. Motivated to become a strong software engineer, work oriented for the result and improve professional skills.

work.summary: Ukrainian healthcare startup. Key technologies used: React, Redux, Redux Saga, Redux Form.

highlights: Web app for homeowners (the key technologies used: Angular 1.*, SCSS);
Chrome extension for Gmail (the key technologies used: InboxSDK, Backbone.js, SCSS);
CRM analytics web app (the key technologies used: React, Redux).

work.summary: The key technologies used: Ember.js, JavaScript, SCSS.
highlights: Development of Ember web app for music library catalog;

work.summary: The key technology used: JavaScript, jQuery, SCSS, Less, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
highlights: supporting and improving company's indor landing management system
work with html for in-app web views inside of desktop application (MacKeeper)
implementation of new technologies (html5, css3, css frameworks, js frameworks)

work.summary: The key technologies used: Backbone.js, PhoneGap, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
highlights: Developed hybrid mobile application PhoneGap (iOS, Android)
Worked with front-end part (in-app html views) of mobile applications;

references.name: Sergey Moliavko
references.reference: Sergey is great young specialist. One of those who has good knowledge, amazing desire to explore and implement new technologies.  I've collaborated with Sergey as product owner and can recommend him as a great front-end developer with huge potential.

references.name: Anastasiia Voitova
references.reference: Sergey is very innovative developer, who always followed the innovations in the industry and successfully applied them in practice. Self-organized and able to achieve the goals. Very friendly, good team player. It was pleasure to work with him.

references.name: Anna Mininkova
references.reference: Sergey is highly professional HTML/CSS technicialist.  We worked together on a few extremely challenging projects, that required continuous attention, constant engagement, commitment and readiness to generate new ideas, and it proved to be an excellent collaboration.  Sergey is especially attentive to details and is eager to try out new technologies and approaches, which makes him a great team member and contractor.
